Pet Manager Cooper:
Welcome to Giran Town Pet Center! To be honest, this kind of busy environment isn't particularly good for the pets. I'm thinking about moving one day to a nice quiet place on the outskirts of town.
Listen to instructions about how to raise a pet.
Purchase pet items.
Exchange pet equipment for higher-grade one.
Exchange the hatchling equipment with the strider equipment.
Evolve pet.
Exchange the pet trade ticket with a pet.
Sell an items.
See the Lord and get the tax rate information.
